title: Inactivity Notification
body: I have played over 4 solo/duo rank games recently 3 days, but it STILL SHOWS this message to me, which says' you are close to becoming inactive  in ranked, You have 2 days left before inactivity causes your LP to decay, which can cause you to drop division & tiers.' I think there must be something wrong with this message showing as I kept playing rank games around these 3 days.... Can someone check this out for me?

replies.body:
It's likely pertaining to your flex rank as you last played that queue a month ago. 
Flex is like soloq when it comes to rank decay rules.

I would recommend submitting a support ticket since we can't do much with account specific enquiries here on boards.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
